bibl.title: The Hesiodic Catalogue of Women and the Megalai Ehoiai.
bibl.note: Examines the similarities between the fragments explicitly attributed to the Catalogue and the Megalai Ehoiai, and explores the possibility that the two titles in fact refer to a single poem.
bibl.seg: Cohen Ivan M., The Hesiodic Catalogue of Women and the Megalai Ehoiai.
Examines the similarities between the fragments explicitly attributed to the Catalogue and the Megalai Ehoiai, and explores the possibility that the two titles in fact refer to a single poem.
